hero.title: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences.

japanclub.title: President
japanclub.description: Led the club activities and organized events.

dokugaku.title: DokuGaku
dokugaku.description: A comprehensive Japanese learning dashboard. Features include lesson tracking, vocabulary lists, and resource navigation.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Dashboard
ecommerce.description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing products, orders, and customers. Features include real-time data visualization and dark mode.

chat.title: Chat Application
chat.description: Real-time messaging app with features like group chats, file sharing, and online status indicators.
